title: Matplotlib Slider Tutorial
description: In this tutorial, we will learn how to create sliders and use them to control a sine wave's frequency and amplitude. We will use the Matplotlib library to create a graph of the sine wave and the sliders. The sliders will allow us to adjust the frequency and amplitude of the sine wave.
